ttl.name: REAR NO. 1 SEAT ASSEMBLY (for Captain Seat Type)

atten2.ptxt: Wear protective gloves. Sharp areas on the parts may injure your hands.

item.ptxt: Use the same procedure for the RH and LH sides.
The procedure listed below is for the RH side.

s2.ptxt: Place the rear No. 1 seat assembly in the cabin.

atten3.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the vehicle body.

s2.ptxt: Temporarily install the rear No. 1 seat assembly with the 4 bolts.
Operate the seat track adjusting handle and move the seat to the rearmost position.
Tighten the 2 bolts in the order shown in the illustration.
Operate the seat track adjusting handle and move the seat to the foremost position.
Tighten the 2 bolts in the order shown in the illustration.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR OUTER SEAT TRACK BRACKET COVER RH

s2.ptxt: Attach the 3 claws to install the rear outer seat track bracket cover RH.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR INNER SEAT TRACK BRACKET COVER RH

s2.ptxt: Attach the claw to install the rear inner seat track bracket cover RH.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL OUTER SEAT TRACK BRACKET COVER RH

s2.ptxt: Operate the seat track adjusting handle and move the seat to the rearmost position.
Attach the claw to install the outer seat track bracket cover RH.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL INNER SEAT TRACK BRACKET COVER RH

s2.ptxt: Attach the 2 claws to install the inner seat track bracket cover RH.
